svg.style: overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; touch-action: none; user-select: none; -webkit-user-drag: none; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); background-color: rgb(255, 255, 255);

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: No

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: LDAP

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Kerberos

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p: Yes

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Start: SOA readiness checklist

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Are your applications utilizing or reliant on Active Directory?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Do you operate on-premises Exchange services?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅Convert source of authority of all groups and users to Microsoft Entra ID. Delete from AD.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅Convert only security groups to Microsoft Entra ID, delete from AD. Shift users and mailboxes to cloud. Remove on-prem Exchange.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Do the applications rely on Active Directory passwords?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Is it possible to migrate the applications to the cloud?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Can passwordless authentication be implemented using cloud Kerberos trust?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ❌Do not shift users tied to these apps to the cloud.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅Shift users/groups to the cloud and access these apps by using Microsoft Entra Private Access. You must manage the on-premisesattributes used for SSO flow manually

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅Modernize app, go passwordless, and shift corresponding users/groups to the cloud.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Is it feasible to update the applications to support SAML or OIDC?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Is the Application Kerberos-based or LDAP-based?

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: Use Entra Domain Services to shift the LDAP application to the cloud before shifting SOA of users using the app.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: You cannot convert SOA of the users until you move to passwordless based authentication.

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ✅Modernize app, move to Microsoft Entra ID auth, shift users/groups tied to these apps to the cloud.
